content: a lovely striped pattern comes to life in a single tone of yarn to create this cozy blanket stitched with bernat softee baby this perfect first blanket project will teach you herringbone half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet and more it s a soothing shade to comfort your child but this crochet blanket would be equally sweet in any color to match the nursery or playroom it s a thoughtful gift for any new mom direct pdf 1 yarn for model bernat softee baby 100% acrylic 140g/5 oz 331m/362yds 5 skeins soft peach also available at yarnspirations 2 yarnspirations pdf https //www yarnspirations com/on/demandware static/-/sites-master-catalog-spinrite/default/dwf3e7a129/pdf/brc0202-032289m pdf 1 https //daisyfarmcrafts com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/diagonal-stripes-pdf pdf 2 https //www yarnspirations com/bernat-crochet-diagonal-stripes-baby-blanket/brc0202-032289m html utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=referral
